title: Classic Yo-Yo Tricks & History
description: Walk the Dog, Rock the Baby, and Around the World! How well do you remember the yo-yo craze that swept schoolyards?

questions.question: Which company became the most famous yo-yo manufacturer in America, starting in the late 1920s?

What basic yo-yo trick involves letting the yo-yo spin at the end of the string before returning it to your hand?
The yo-yo trick 'Walk the Dog' involves doing what with a spinning yo-yo?
options: Letting it roll along the ground

questions.question: In the 1950s and 1960s, Duncan promoted yo-yos through what type of touring event?
options: Yo-yo demonstration contests at schools and stores

questions.question: What yo-yo trick involves forming a triangle shape with the string while the yo-yo swings inside it?
